content: **crocheted top with granny squares in drops safran sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-340 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs/s - m - l - xl/xxl - xxxl **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-150-150-200 g colour 18 off white 50-50-50-50-50 g colour 50 mint 50-50-50-50-50 g colour 59 red clay 50-50-50-50-50 g colour 56 powder pink 50-50-50-50-50 g colour 63 sea green 50-50-50-50-50 g colour 68 coffee crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 1 square measures approx 7½ cm x 7½ cm this corresponds to approx 22 treble crochets in width and 12 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
